title: Expert Competency Development Program for Applying Family-Centered Approaches in Early Intervention

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Theories and Practical Experience in Early Intervention
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum design reflecting FCA training needs perceived by Spanish EI Center experts

learning_goals: Learners can explain the philosophical foundations and core principles of the Family-Centered Approach (FCA)
Learners can apply FCA practice skills with 80% accuracy through role model observation under expert supervision
Learners can utilize three or more FCA-based communication strategies in multidisciplinary team collaboration scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
